author: Brittney Stephens
title: These Pictures of Drew Barrymore Will Remind You Why She's Always Been the Best
text:
Drew Barrymore Pictures Over the Years These Pictures of Drew Barrymore Will Remind You Why She's Always Been the Best February 22, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 These Pictures of Drew Barrymore Will Remind You Why She's Always Been the Best 
Drew Barrymore first charmed audiences when she was just a child; she scored a Puppy Chow commercial at just 11 months old, and her breakout role as Gertie in 1982's E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial sent her into the stratosphere. She's been a Hollywood mainstay ever since . Her life and career has been punctuated with many public ups and downs, but it's clear that the actress has come out stronger than ever. We're taking a look back at Drew's incredible life in pictures. Related:
